snippet: Agnieszka Radwanska snapped a six-match losing streak to Maria Sharapova, a three-time Grand Slam winner, and solidified her place at the top of the women’s game.
abstract: Agnieszka Radwanska defeats Maria Sharapova to win women's final at the Sony Ericsson Open tennis tournament; ends a six-match losing streak against Sharapova and further solidifies a spot at the top of the women's game.
lead_paragraph: Agnieszka Radwanska snapped a six-match losing streak to Maria Sharapova, a three-time Grand Slam winner, and solidified her place at the top of the women’s game.

headline.seo: Radwanska Ends Skid vs. Sharapova in Key Biscayne
headline.main: Sharapova Loses in Final, Making 45 Unforced Errors
headline.print_headline: Radwanska Makes Move Toward the Top and Ends Skid vs. Sharapova
